publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3632 Pauline McNeill: Parliament Welcomes the Civil Partnership Act—That the Parliament welcomes the Civil Partnership Act 2004, which comes into force on 5 December 2005; recognises that the Act, which seeks to give social and legal inclusion to couples of the same sex, will be a major step forward for equality, and congratulates everyone at the Scottish Executive, the UK Government and the Scottish and UK Parliaments who contributed to the drafting of the legislation.

S2M-3632 Pauline McNeill: Parliament Welcomes the Civil Partnership Act—That the Parliament welcomes the Civil Partnership Act 2004, which comes into force on 5 December 2005; recognises that the Act, which seeks to give social and legal inclusion to couples of the same sex, will be a major step forward for equality, and congratulates everyone at the Scottish Executive, the UK Government and the Scottish and UK Parliaments who contributed to the drafting of the legislation.
S2M-3632 Parliament Welcomes the Civil Partnership Act (lodged on 24 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3632 Parliament Welcomes the Civil Partnership Act (lodged on 24 November 2005) Iain Smith*
S2M-3632 Parliament Welcomes the Civil Partnership Act (lodged on 24 November 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3632 Parliament Welcomes the Civil Partnership Act (lodged on 24 November 2005) Susan Deacon*
